## Code Examples

### Factorial

Two possible implementations for calculating factorials.
Pseudo code from Wikipedia:
```
define factorial(n):
  f := 1
  for i := 1, 2, 3, ..., n:
    f := f × i
  return f
```

Imperative approach
```rym
func factorial(n: uint) -> uint {
  mut result = 1
  for const i in 1..=n {
    result *= i
  }
  result
}
```

Functional approach
```rym
func factorial(n: uint) -> uint {
	(1..=n).fold(1, (accum, i) -> accum * i)
}
```

### Summands __TODO Use better name_

```rym
func main() -> @Io {
  const numbers = [-14, 1, 3, 6, 7, 7, 12]

  const sum = -13
  if const Some([left, right]) = summands(numbers, -13) {
    print(f"Sum of {left} and {right} = {sum}")
  }
  print("Pointers have crossed, no sum found")
}

/// array must be sorted
func summands(array: [i32], sum: i32) -> Option<[usize; 2]> {
  mut low = 0
  mut high = array.len() - 1

  while low < high {
    const current_sum = array[low] + array[high]

    if current_sum == sum {
      return Some([array[low], array[high]])
    } else if current_sum < sum {
      low += 1
    } else {
      high -= 1
    }
  }

  None
}
```
